title: py-rpy2 test fails with LookupError: 'show' not found
body:
If I install py-rpy2 with spack and try to run the tests that ship with py-rpy2, they fail.

### Expected Result

I expected the tests to pass.

### Actual Result

```console
/usr/workspace/wsrzc/pozulp1/sp/lalor_spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.9.3/python-3.6.2-dww6q37ao4ibgmxtwsj4ukax5tjl7xbb/lib/python3.6/site-packages/rpy2/rinterface/__init__.py:146: RRuntimeWarning: Error in !value : invalid argument type

  warnings.warn(x, RRuntimeWarning)
rpy2 version: 2.9.4
- built against R version: 3-5.0--74626
- running linked to R version: R version 3.5.0 (2018-04-23)
E
======================================================================
ERROR: __main__ (unittest.loader._FailedTest)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/workspace/wsrzc/pozulp1/sp/lalor_spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.9.3/python-3.6.2-dww6q37ao4ibgmxtwsj4ukax5tjl7xbb/lib/python3.6/site-packages/rpy2/tests.py", line 43, in load_tests
    suite_robjects = loader.discover('robjects', pattern, rpy_root)
  File "/usr/workspace/wsrzc/pozulp1/sp/lalor_spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.9.3/python-3.6.2-dww6q37ao4ibgmxtwsj4ukax5tjl7xbb/lib/python3.6/unittest/loader.py", line 290, in discover
    __import__(start_dir)
  File "/usr/workspace/wsrzc/pozulp1/sp/lalor_spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.9.3/python-3.6.2-dww6q37ao4ibgmxtwsj4ukax5tjl7xbb/lib/python3.6/site-packages/rpy2/robjects/__init__.py", line 19, in <module>
    from rpy2.robjects.robject import RObjectMixin, RObject
  File "/usr/workspace/wsrzc/pozulp1/sp/lalor_spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.9.3/python-3.6.2-dww6q37ao4ibgmxtwsj4ukax5tjl7xbb/lib/python3.6/site-packages/rpy2/robjects/__init__.py", line 19, in <module>
    from rpy2.robjects.robject import RObjectMixin, RObject
  File "/usr/workspace/wsrzc/pozulp1/sp/lalor_spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.9.3/python-3.6.2-dww6q37ao4ibgmxtwsj4ukax5tjl7xbb/lib/python3.6/site-packages/rpy2/robjects/robject.py", line 52, in <module>
    class RObjectMixin(object):
  File "/usr/workspace/wsrzc/pozulp1/sp/lalor_spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.9.3/python-3.6.2-dww6q37ao4ibgmxtwsj4ukax5tjl7xbb/lib/python3.6/site-packages/rpy2/robjects/robject.py", line 66, in RObjectMixin
    __show = rpy2.rinterface.baseenv.get("show")
LookupError: 'show' not found

----------------------------------------------------------------------
Ran 1 test in 0.000s

FAILED (errors=1)
```
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
(I'm at LLNL)
$ ssh rztopaz
$ git clone ssh://git@rz-bitbucket.llnl.gov:7999/opac/spack.git lalor_spack
$ cd lalor_spack
$ salloc -N1 --exclusive -t 2:00:00
$ ./bin/spack install -n py-rpy2@2.9.4 ^python@3.6.2 ^r@3.5.0
$ ./bin/spack activate py-rpy2
$ `./bin/spack location -i python@3.6.2`/bin/python3 -m rpy2.tests
```

### Information on your system

I'm on a toss3 system (x86 Broadwell) named rztopaz.
I am not using a packages.yaml.

### Friends who may be able to help

@lee218llnl @citibeth @adamjstewart @mathstuf 
I hope you don't mind me tagging you, I got your names from
```console
$ spack blame -g py-rpy2
``` 
and I know many of you are quite good at spack :)
